scavenger.name: Vault Dweller
scavenger.description: Just emerged from the vault, adapting to high-radiation environments and struggling to survive.

wastelander.name: Wasteland Scavenger
wastelander.description: Familiar with wasteland rules, collecting pre-war tech and establishing initial outposts.

mutant.name: Mercenary Veteran
mutant.description: Equipped with quality gear, has a place in Diamond City or Rivet City. A 'nuclear core' has formed within.

evolved.name: Brotherhood Paladin
evolved.description: Qualified to pilot Power Armor. Flesh and machine have merged perfectly, combat power transformed.

apex.name: Enclave General
apex.description: Has orbital strike authorization. Will and spirit sufficient to interfere with reality, ruling over the wasteland.

transcendent.name: Cyber-Ascendant
transcendent.description: An existence like Frank Horrigan - a half-human, half-god bio-weapon beyond mortal limits.

immortal.name: Wasteland Legend
immortal.description: Become a legend like the 'Lone Wanderer' or 'The Courier', completely dominating the wasteland's fate.

messages.atMaxTier: You have become a Wasteland Legend!
messages.evolutionSuccess: Gene Splicing successful! You are now a {tier}!
messages.evolutionFailed: Gene Splicing failed. Your body rejected the modification.
messages.notReady: Not enough Genetic Data to evolve.
